statements: SELECT * FROM financial_instruments;
SELECT symbol, price FROM financial_instruments WHERE exchange = 'NYSE';
SELECT symbol, instrument_type FROM financial_instruments WHERE volume > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT exchange, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM financial_instruments GROUP BY exchange;
SELECT symbol, price FROM financial_instruments WHERE instrument_type = 'Stock' ORDER BY price DESC, symbol ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, volume FROM financial_instruments WHERE exchange = 'NYSE' AND volume > 10000 ORDER BY volume DESC;
SELECT symbol, price, last_updated FROM financial_instruments WHERE price >= 100 AND (instrument_type = 'Option' OR instrument_type = 'Future') ORDER BY last_updated ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments WHERE exchange = 'NASDAQ' AND last_updated >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT instrument_type FROM financial_instruments ORDER BY instrument_type ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments;
SELECT instrument_name, instrument_type, exchange FROM financial_instruments;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE strategy_type='Trend Following';
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM trading_strategies;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments ORDER BY instrument_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments ORDER BY instrument_name DESC;
SELECT instrument_name, instrument_type FROM financial_instruments WHERE exchange = 'NYSE' AND instrument_type = 'Stocks';
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT instrument_name, exchange FROM financial_instruments WHERE instrument_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT instrument_id, instrument_name, instrument_type FROM financial_instruments WHERE exchange LIKE '%LSE%';
SELECT * FROM instruments;
SELECT id, name, symbol FROM instruments ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, symbol, id FROM instruments WHERE symbol='AAPL';
SELECT * FROM prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, quantity, trade_date FROM trades WHERE trade_type='Buy';
SELECT * FROM instruments ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, symbol FROM instruments WHERE id > 5;
SELECT * FROM prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT instrument_id, SUM(quantity) FROM trades GROUP BY instrument_id;
SELECT * FROM instruments JOIN trades ON instruments.id = trades.instrument_id WHERE trade_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM traders;
SELECT name, country FROM traders ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, symbol, name, exchange FROM instruments WHERE exchange = 'NYSE';
SELECT * FROM prices ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT instrument_id, SUM(quantity) FROM trades GROUP BY instrument_id;
SELECT * FROM instruments;
SELECT id, symbol, name FROM instruments ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, symbol, exchange FROM instruments WHERE exchange='NYSE';
SELECT name, price, timestamp FROM instruments JOIN prices ON instruments.id = prices.instrument_id;

SELECT traders.name, instruments.name, trades.quantity FROM traders JOIN trades ON traders.id = trades.trader_id JOIN instruments ON trades.instrument_id = instruments.id ORDER BY trades.quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT symbol, asset_class, price FROM financial_instruments WHERE exchange = 'NYSE';
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE risk_tolerance = 'High' ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT instrument_id, order_type, price, quantity FROM order_book WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT trade_date, instrument_id, trade_type, price FROM trades ORDER BY trade_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM financial_instruments WHERE asset_class = 'Stocks';
SELECT id, symbol, price FROM financial_instruments ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT instrument_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM order_book GROUP BY instrument_id HAVING total_quantity > 1000;
SELECT t.id, t.trade_date, fi.symbol, t.trade_type, t.price FROM trades t JOIN financial_instruments fi ON t.instrument_id = fi.id;
SELECT m.id, m.date_time, fi.symbol, m.price FROM market_data m JOIN financial_instruments fi ON m.instrument_id = fi.id WHERE m.price > 100 AND m.volume > 5000;
